price: 66. Ee Allaah Keliya uun caabud, kana mid ahow kuwa ku mahdiya(af,uur iyo addinba).
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: bali al-laha fa-uʿ'bud wakun mina al-shākirīna
